Razorwing knew that time was running out.

Razorwing: Deadfur stay in radio=
 contact and wait for my command.
Newbot it's time follow me, we're digging=
 in. 

Has he flew, Remus followed him trying not to think about what could=

happen, he knew what he must do. Razorwing spotted a window he knew
that w=
ould be the entrance. Has they broke into the parliament, Remus
and Razorwi=
ng landed in the center of the the circular room. The enemy
rapidly realize=
d who they we're, and soon rain of blast and missile
we're exploding all ov=
er the place. Some wall could give cover to
Razorwing  and Remus but it was=
 just a matter of time before anyone
get them. they had to be quick.

Has R=
azorwing took a small clock-looking device from under his wing,
he started =

is will
defenitly affect all the bot in the area.

IN THIS AREA!!!!

was made to p=

ocked them off quite some time. The core

 either, not at this power level.

Razorwing didn't tell Remus that this wa=
s just theorical : this

ject. He himself

Has Razorwing fin=
ished the setting of the bomb, he realised the remus

nd some blast on the chest he didn't respond to

Has he took Remus in his back he took radion cont=
act with Deadfur

While he was flying out with Remus, he capted an encryp=
ted message,

e
